Name: Tag Royale
About the game: Why I made this game: I made this game for everyone to enjoy playing a classic game together with a twist. Can you be the last one to survive and not be tagged? What this game expresses: I want Tag Royal to help build friendships and make new ones. I wanted to go back to basics and do what makes making games fun and that's for everyone to enjoy my game. Content: Play up to 100 players and be the last one tagged. Overview of the gameplay: Use powers to outrun, out-smart and out maneuver your opponent. A classic game of tag but on a huge scale. If you are picked as being IT don't worry you will get a fighting chance by being respawned back as a not it.
